sen.j: 常陸娘（ひたちのいらつめ、生没年不詳）は、蘇我赤兄の娘。
sen.e: Hitachi no Iratsume (dates of birth and death unknown) was a daughter of SOGA no Akae.
Hitachi no Iratsume (dates of birth and death unknown) was a daughter of SOGA no Akae.
Hitachi no Iratsume (dates of birth and death unknown) was a daughter of SOGA no Akae.

sen.j: 天智天皇の妃となり、山辺皇女を生む。
sen.e: He became a wife of Emperor Tenchi and gave birth to Princess Yamanobeno Himemiko.
He became a wife of Emperor Tenchi and gave birth to Princess Yamanobeno Himemiko.
He became a wife of Emperor Tenchi and gave birth to Princess Yamanobeno Himemiko.

sen.j: 天武天皇の妃となった大蕤娘とは姉妹である。
sen.e: Her sister, Onu no Iratsume, became a wife of Emperor Tenmu.
Her sister, Onu no Iratsume, became a wife of Emperor Tenmu.
Her sister, Onu no Iratsume, became a wife of Emperor Tenmu.

sen.j: 同じ天智天皇の妃となった、蘇我倉山田石川麻呂の娘遠智娘・姪娘姉妹とは従姉妹にあたる。
sen.e: Ochi no iratsume and Mei no Iratsume, daughters of SOGANOKURA-YAMADA no Ishikawamaro, who also became wives of Emperor Tenchi, were her cousins.
